DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , multi-centre , non-interventional study collect finding effect LABA/LAMA ( Long Acting Beta2-Agonists / Long Acting Muscarinic Antagonists ) combination preparation COPD ( Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ) symptoms quality life real condition find types patient select therapy physician .
DOC.brief_title: DETECT-Register DocumEnTation Evaluation COPD Combination Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Retrospective aspect documentation : For patient already change fixed-dose combination , lung function parameter CAT ( COPD Assessment Test™ ) score time prior changeover document .
DOC.criteria: Female/male least 40 year age Patient diagnose COPD Patient change within last 3 month fixeddose combination ( FDC ) ( Aclidinium/Formeterol , Glycopyrronium/Indacaterol Umeclidinium/Vilanterol ) , already intent change patient fixeddose combination ( Aclidinium/Formeterol , Glycopyrronium/Indacaterol Umeclidinium/Vilanterol ) . Lung function parameter CAT score time prior changeover FDC record ( within last 6 month case patient already change ) determine 1st visit ( case patient yet change changeover intend ) . Signed declaration consent The prescribe information fixeddose combination ( Duaklir® Genuair® , Ulibtro® Breezhaler® Anoro® ) list contraindication patient . Patient pregnant , plan become pregnant , nursing therapy period . Patient suffers hypersensitivity one active ingredient fixeddose combination . Patient participate clinical trial .
DOC.keyword: LAMA/LABA ( Long Acting Beta2-Agonists / Long Acting Muscarinic Antagonists )
